p: As in native NV particles, the NVCP also folds into two distinctive domains in VLPs, with S domain forming the inner core of the shell and P domain protruding out from the capsid [ 108]. Similarly, the P2 subdomain is also the most surface exposed region in NV VLPs and may contain HBGA and neutralizing antibody binding sites and determinants of strains specificity [ 27, 56, 108â€“ 111]. The similarity between VLPs of NV and other NoVs including GII.4 viruses has been demonstrated [ 112].
